OrgName: GEP Administrative Services, Inc. dba Entertainment Partners
activities:
GEP Administrative Services, Inc. dba Entertainment Partners ("EP") is the leader in entertainment payroll, residuals, tax incentives, finance, and other integrated production management solutions.  Combining its comprehensive capabilities, extensive resources, and industry experience, EP collaborates with clients to help them produce the most cost-effective and efficient film, television, digital and commercial projects.  Its proprietary production accounting and management software services and products are the industry standards. 

With respect to data, EP acts primarily in the following two capacities: (1) EP as a controller of data supplied through its Website; and (2) EP as a processor of its clients' data uploaded and hosted on EP's Online Services.

EP, as a controller of data, collects general contact information through its Website for those visitors that inquire about EP's products or services.  EP, as a processor of its clients' data, may use such data for a variety of purposes, including (1) payroll services; (2) benefits administration; (3) tax and regulatory compliance; (4) time and attendance; (5) insurance services; (6) entertainment production accounting; and (7) HR business process outsourcing.
